price: I svaki od vas će do njega stići! Gospodar tvoj se, sigurno, tako obavezao!
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
